statements.statement: insert into TT_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN_SUDUNG select '$THE_ID$' as THE_ID ,THETHANHVIEN_ID ,DICHVU_ID ,SOLANTHUCHIEN as SOLANDINHMUC ,0 as SOLANDASUDUNG ,SOLANTHUCHIEN as SOLANCONLAI ,TYLEGIAM ,SOTIENGIAM ,BENHVIEN_ID ,SYSDATE as NGAYTAO ,'$NGUOITAO_ID$' as NGUOITAO_ID , SYSDATE as NGAYCAPNHAT ,'$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$' as NGUOICAPNHAT_ID from TM_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN_DICHVU where THETHANHVIEN_ID = (select THETHANHVIEN_ID from TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE where THE_ID = '$THE_ID$' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$') and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
select * from TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE where SOVOUCHER = '$SOVOUCHER$'
select * from TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN where BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' and (TAMNGUNG is null or TAMNGUNG = '0') and (DAXOA is null or DAXOA = '0')

select A.BENHNHAN_ID, A.NGAYTAOHOIVIEN, A.BACSICHIDINH_ID, A.NOICHIDINH_ID, '0' as UPDATETHE, B.* from TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE B left join TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN A on A.THANHVIEN_ID = B.THANHVIEN_ID and B.THETHANHVIEN_ID is not null and (B.TAMNGUNG is null or B.TAMNGUNG = '0') where BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' and (A.TAMNGUNG is null or A.TAMNGUNG = '0') and (A.DAXOA is null or A.DAXOA = '0')

SELECT count(B.THE_ID) as TOTALROWS from TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN A left join ( select A.THE_ID, A.MATHE, A.KICHHOAT, A.THETHANHVIEN_ID, A.THANHVIEN_ID, A.NGAYTAO, A.NGAYDANGKY, A.NGAYKICHHOAT, A.TAMNGUNG, A.SOVOUCHER, B.TENTHETHANHVIEN from TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE A left join TM_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN B on A.THETHANHVIEN_ID = B.THETHANHVIEN_ID ) B on A.THANHVIEN_ID = B.THANHVIEN_ID inner join TT_BENHNHAN C on C.BENHNHAN_ID = A.BENHNHAN_ID where A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and B.TAMNGUNG is null
(C.TENBENHNHAN like N'%$TENBENHNHAN$%' or C.MAYTE like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%')
(B.MATHE like N'%$MATHETHANHVIEN$S%')
TRUNC(B.NGAYTAO) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)
TRUNC(B.NGAYKICHHOAT) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)

select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by A.BENHNHAN_ID) as ROWNUMBER, A.MATHANHVIEN, B.THE_ID, B.MATHE, B.KICHHOAT, B.THETHANHVIEN_ID, B.TENTHETHANHVIEN,B.NGAYHIEULUC, B.NGAYHETHAN, B.DATHUTIEN, B.NGAYKICHHOAT, C.*, D.DESCRIPTION, B.TAMNGUNG, B.SOVOUCHER from TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN A left join ( select A.THE_ID, A.MATHE, A.KICHHOAT, A.DATHUTIEN, A.THETHANHVIEN_ID, A.THANHVIEN_ID, A.NGAYTAO, A.NGAYDANGKY, A.NGAYKICHHOAT, B.TENTHETHANHVIEN, A.NGAYHIEULUC, A.NGAYHETHAN, A.TAMNGUNG, A.SOVOUCHER from TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE A left join TM_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN B on A.THETHANHVIEN_ID = B.THETHANHVIEN_ID ) B on A.THANHVIEN_ID = B.THANHVIEN_ID inner join TT_BENHNHAN C on C.BENHNHAN_ID = A.BENHNHAN_ID left join TM_GENDER D on C.GIOITINH = D.ID where A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and B.TAMNGUNG is null
(C.TENBENHNHAN like N'%$TENBENHNHAN$%' or C.MAYTE like N'%$TENBENHNHAN$%')
(B.MATHE like N'%$MATHETHANHVIEN$%')
TRUNC(B.NGAYTAO) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)
TRUNC(B.NGAYKICHHOAT) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)
) lst
where lst.ROWNUMBER between $FROMROW$ and $TOROW$
order by lst.BENHNHAN_ID asc

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by A.BENHNHAN_ID) as ROWNUMBER, A.MATHANHVIEN, B.THE_ID, B.MATHE, B.KICHHOAT, B.THETHANHVIEN_ID, B.TENTHETHANHVIEN,B.NGAYHIEULUC, B.NGAYHETHAN, B.DATHUTIEN, C.*, D.DESCRIPTION from TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN A left join ( select A.THE_ID, A.MATHE, A.KICHHOAT, A.DATHUTIEN, A.THETHANHVIEN_ID, A.THANHVIEN_ID, B.TENTHETHANHVIEN, A.NGAYHIEULUC, A.NGAYHETHAN from TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE A left join TM_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN B on A.THETHANHVIEN_ID = B.THETHANHVIEN_ID ) B on A.THANHVIEN_ID = B.THANHVIEN_ID inner join TT_BENHNHAN C on C.BENHNHAN_ID = A.BENHNHAN_ID left join TM_GENDER D on C.GIOITINH = D.ID where A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND B.KICHHOAT = '1'
(C.TENBENHNHAN like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%' or C.MAYTE like '%$TENBENHNHAN$%')
(B.MATHE like '%$MATHETHANHVIEN$%')
order by B.BENHNHAN_ID asc
select A.*, B.TENDICHVU, B.MADICHVU from TT_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN_SUDUNG A left join TM_DICHVU B on B.DICHVU_ID = A.DICHVU_ID and B.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' where THE_ID = '$THE_ID$'
update TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE set TAMNGUNG = '1' where THE_ID in ($THE_ID$); update TT_VIENPHI set ACTIVE = '0' where REF_TABLE = 'TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE' and REF_ID in ($THE_ID$);
update TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN set TAMNGUNG = '1' where BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$';
statements.insert:
select TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN ( THANHVIEN_ID , MATHANHVIEN , BENHNHAN_ID , NGAYTAOHOIVIEN , NOICHIDINH_ID , BACSICHIDINH_ID , DATHUTIEN , DAXOA , TAMNGUNG , BENHVIEN_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID ) values ( #ID# , #MATHANHVIEN# , #BENHNHAN_ID# , #NGAYTAOHOIVIEN# , #NOICHIDINH_ID# , #BACSICHIDINH_ID# , #DATHUTIEN# , #DAXOA# , #TAMNGUNG# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# )
statements.update:
update TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN set MATHANHVIEN = #MATHANHVIEN#
BENHNHAN_ID = #BENHNHAN_ID#
NGAYTAOHOIVIEN = #NGAYTAOHOIVIEN#
NOICHIDINH_ID = #NOICHIDINH_ID#
BACSICHIDINH_ID = #BACSICHIDINH_ID#
DATHUTIEN = #DATHUTIEN#
DAXOA = #DAXOA#
TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG#
BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID#
NGAYTAO = #NGAYTAO#
NGUOITAO_ID = #NGUOITAO_ID#
NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT#
NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#
where THANHVIEN_ID = '$THANHVIEN_ID$'
statements.insert:
select TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE ( THE_ID , MATHE , TAIKHOAN_ID , THANHVIEN_ID , THETHANHVIEN_ID , DATHUTIEN , NGAYDANGKY , NGAYHIEULUC , NGAYHETHAN , KICHHOAT , TAMNGUNG , THOIHAN , SOVOUCHER , BENHVIEN_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID ) values ( #ID# , #MATHE# , #TAIKHOAN_ID# , #THANHVIEN_ID# , #THETHANHVIEN_ID# , #DATHUTIEN# , #NGAYDANGKY# , #NGAYHIEULUC# , #NGAYHETHAN# , #KICHHOAT# , #TAMNGUNG# , #THOIHAN# , #SOVOUCHER# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# )
statements.statement:
update TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE set DATHUTIEN = '1'
, NGUOIKICHHOAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$' , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$' where THE_ID = '$THE_ID$'

update TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE set DATHUTIEN = '1' , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$' , NGAYCAPNHAT = SYSDATE
where THE_ID = '$THE_ID$'
statements.update:
update TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE set MATHE = #MATHE#
TAIKHOAN_ID = #TAIKHOAN_ID#
THANHVIEN_ID = #THANHVIEN_ID#
THETHANHVIEN_ID = #THETHANHVIEN_ID#
DATHUTIEN = #DATHUTIEN#
NGAYHIEULUC = #NGAYHIEULUC#
NGAYHETHAN = #NGAYHETHAN#
THOIHAN = #THOIHAN#
SOVOUCHER = #SOVOUCHER#
TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG#
TAMNGUNG = #TAMNGUNG#
BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID#
NGAYTAO = #NGAYTAO#
NGUOITAO_ID = #NGUOITAO_ID#
NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT#
NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID#
where THE_ID = '$THE_ID$'
statements.statement:
SELECT D.DICHVU_ID, D.MADICHVU, D.TENDICHVU, N.NHOMDICHVU_ID, N.TENNHOMDICHVU, L.LOAIDICHVU_ID, L.TENLOAIDICHVU, 0 as CHON FROM TM_DICHVU D INNER JOIN TM_NHOMDICHVU N ON N.NHOMDICHVU_ID = D.NHOMDICHVU_ID AND N.TAMNGUNG = '0' AND N.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' INNER JOIN TM_LOAIDICHVU L ON L.LOAIDICHVU_ID = N.LOAIDICHVU_ID AND L.TAMNGUNG = '0' AND L.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' WHERE D.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND D.TAMNGUNG = '0' AND D.COGIADICHVU = '1'
(D.TENDICHVU like '%$TENDICHVU$%' or D.MADICHVU like '%$TENDICHVU$%')
(N.NHOMDICHVU_ID = '$NHOMDICHVU_ID$')

select D.DICHVU_ID, D.MADICHVU, D.TENDICHVU, N.NHOMDICHVU_ID, N.TENNHOMDICHVU, L.LOAIDICHVU_ID, L.TENLOAIDICHVU , TVGG.SOTIENGIAM, TVGG.TYLEGIAM, TVGG.SOLANTHUCHIEN, TVGG.THETHANHVIEN_ID, TTV.MATHETHANHVIEN from TM_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN_DICHVU TVGG left join TM_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN TTV on TTV.THETHANHVIEN_ID = TVGG.THETHANHVIEN_ID and TTV.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' inner join TM_DICHVU D on TVGG.DICHVU_ID = D.DICHVU_ID and D.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND D.TAMNGUNG = '0' AND D.COGIADICHVU = '1' INNER JOIN TM_NHOMDICHVU N ON N.NHOMDICHVU_ID = D.NHOMDICHVU_ID AND N.TAMNGUNG = '0' AND N.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' INNER JOIN TM_LOAIDICHVU L ON L.LOAIDICHVU_ID = N.LOAIDICHVU_ID AND L.TAMNGUNG = '0' AND L.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' where TVGG.THETHANHVIEN_ID = '$THETHANHVIEN_ID$' and TVGG.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

select LOAIGIA_ID from TM_LOAIGIA where CAPTREN_ID in (select LOAIGIA_ID from TM_LOAIGIA where MALOAIGIA = 'GiaDichVu' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$') and TAMNGUNG = '0' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and NHOMGIA_ID in (select DICTIONARY_ID from LST_DICTIONARY where DICTIONARY_TYPE_CODE = 'nhomgia' and DICTIONARY_CODE = 'binhthuong')
select count(THE_ID) as DAPHATHANH from TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE where THETHANHVIEN_ID = '$THETHANHVIEN_ID$'
select count(*) as MATHETHANHVIEN from TM_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN where MATHETHANHVIEN = '$TMATHETHANHVIEN$'

select TM_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN_DICHVU_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN_DICHVU ( THETHANHVIEN_DICHVU_ID , THETHANHVIEN_ID , DICHVU_ID , TYLEGIAM , SOTIENGIAM , SOLANTHUCHIEN , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYCAPNHAT , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #THETHANHVIEN_ID# , #DICHVU_ID# , #TYLEGIAM# , #SOTIENGIAM# , #SOLANTHUCHIEN# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYCAPNHAT# , #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
delete from TM_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN_DICHVU where THETHANHVIEN_ID = '$THETHANHVIEN_ID$'
select NHOMDICHVU_ID, MANHOMDICHVU, TENNHOMDICHVU from TM_NHOMDICHVU where BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
select * from TT_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN_SUDUNG where THE_ID = '$THE_ID$' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

update TT_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN_SUDUNG set SOLANDASUDUNG = NVL(SOLANDASUDUNG, 0) + #SOLANDASUDUNG#, SOLANCONLAI = SOLANDINHMUC - (NVL(SOLANDASUDUNG, 0) + #SOLANDASUDUNG#), NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT#, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# where THE_ID = '$THE_ID$' and DICHVU_ID = '$DICHVU_ID$' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

update TT_CSKH_THETHANHVIEN_SUDUNG set SOLANDASUDUNG = SOLANDASUDUNG - #SOLUONG#, SOLANCONLAI = SOLANCONLAI + #SOLUONG#, NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT#, NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# where THE_ID = '$THE_ID$' and DICHVU_ID = '$DICHVU_ID$' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
select * from TT_CSKH_THANHVIEN_CAPTHE where THE_ID = '$THE_ID$' and DATHUTIEN = '1' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
